name: Rainbow Rocket
description:
You are on a little RAINBOW-FUELED spaceship, collecting colorful artifacts. The only way to move is to place small black holes around you. Look out for hostile alien life!

There is a little SECRET if you finish all 20 levels with 0 deaths! Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 26 with the theme "Minimalist", Programming, art and music by me.
